item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Wednesday, March 19, 2025 at 10:20 AM UTC
item.description:
1. Two new PebbleOS watches (1340 points | 406 comments)
2. Make Ubuntu packages 90% faster by rebuilding them (381 points | 228 comments)
3. Crew-9 Returns to Earth (207 points | 154 comments)
4. Apple restricts Pebble from being awesome with iPhones (1456 points | 871 comments)
5. Visualising data structures and algorithms through animation (130 points | 6 comments)
6. Show HN: I made a tool to port tweets to Bluesky mantaining their original date (395 points | 148 comments)
7. Selective async commits in PostgreSQL – balancing durability and performance (13 points | 1 comment)
8. Some notes on Grafana Loki's new "structured metadata" (62 points | 18 comments)
9. Artificial Intelligence: Foundations of Computational Agents (109 points | 35 comments)
10. Google to buy Wiz for $32B (496 points | 677 comments)
11. Designing Electronics That Work (220 points | 85 comments)
12. HTTrack Website Copier (166 points | 53 comments)
13. Karatsuba Matrix Multiplication and Its Efficient Hardware Implementations (113 points | 11 comments)
14. Small Archives (9 points | discuss)
15. SheepShaver is an open source PowerPC Apple Macintosh emulator (93 points | 42 comments)
16. Show HN: "Git who" – A new CLI tool for industrial-scale Git blaming (188 points | 97 comments)
17. US appeals court rules AI generated art cannot be copyrighted (599 points | 408 comments)
18. Nvidia Dynamo: A Datacenter Scale Distributed Inference Serving Framework (124 points | 25 comments)
19. The Intenet Slum: is abandoning the Internet the next big thing? (2004) (48 points | 50 comments)
20. This is no world for an axolotl (136 points | 61 comments)
21. Show HN: I made a live multiplayer Minesweeper game (197 points | 71 comments)
22. 20 Years of YC / HN (133 points | 31 comments)
23. The "Memory Cartography" of Azerbaijani Emigrants (13 points | 1 comment)
24. SheepIt Render Farm server code goes open source (151 points | 29 comments)
25. Block YouTube ads on AppleTV by decrypting and stripping ads from Profobuf (2022) (697 points | 409 comments)
26. Ask HN: How Do I Escape Homelessness After Rebuilding My Mental Health? (262 points | 148 comments)
27. A Tale of Four Kernels [pdf] (2008) (56 points | 9 comments)
28. Rippling sues Deel over spying (493 points | 122 comments)
29. Dear hosters, you are selling wood, not furniture (19 points | 5 comments)
30. The Dark Crystal: Age of Resistance Is a Stone-Cold Masterpiece (191 points | 103 comments)
